resources.string: We care about your privacy and data security.
We keep this app %1$s by using third party services.

We use %1$s in this app. This service (including its partners) collects unique identifiers and other personal data. You can change your choice at any time in the app settings. Learn more about this service and your personal data.

We use %1$s in this app. These services (including their partners) collect unique identifiers and other personal data. You can change your choice at any time in the app settings. Learn more about these services and your personal data.
By agreeing, you are confirming that you are over the age of 16.
Can we continue to use your data for these purposes%1$s?
\u0020as well as for showing personalized ads
We use the following third party services in this app:
Click on a service to check out its privacy policy%1$s.
\u0020or click the following to check out our app\'s privacy policy

We won\'t collect your data for personalized advertising. Although non-personalized ads don\'t use mobile ad identifiers for ad targeting, they do still use mobile identifiers for frequency capping and aggregated ad reporting as well as for combating fraud and abuse."
I confirm that I\'m 16 years or older
No thank you, I want to buy the app
I understand that I will still see ads, but they may not be as relevant to my interests.
